Citation: To The House I Live In, tolerance short subject; produced by Frank Ross and Mervyn LeRoy; directed by Mervyn LeRoy; screenplay by Albert Maltz; song \"The House I Live In,\" music by Earl Robinson, lyrics by Lewis Allan; starring Frank Sinatra; released by RKO Radio.
